name: honeydew-employee-service
description: Service responsible for all operations related to employees

scripts.aws:login: aws codeartifact login --profile honeydew --tool npm --repository honeydew-shared --domain honeydew --domain-owner 882887517494 --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --stage dev --region us-west-2 --config ./serverless.yml
scripts.deploy-test: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --stage test --region us-west-2 --config ./serverless.yml
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls deploy --stage prod --region us-east-1 --config ./serverless.yml
scripts.deploy-domain-dev: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls create_domain --stage dev --config ./serverless.yml
scripts.deploy-domain-test: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls create_domain --stage test --config ./serverless.yml
scripts.deploy-domain-prod: npm run lint:fix && npm run prettier:fix && sls create_domain --stage prod --config ./serverless-prod.yml
